question: Which among the following statement is INCORRECT?
option1: Vijay sen was the most famous and powerful king of Sen Dynasty
option2: Samanta Sen was the founder of Sen Dynasty
option3: Samanta Sen was the son of Hemanta Sen
option4: Adbhutta Sagara was a work of Ballal Sen
answer: Samanta Sen was the son of Hemanta Sen
explanation: Samanta Sen was the Father of Hemanta Sen
